content.p: The form of an action for a breach of warranty in a deed may be as follows: IN THE __________ COURT OF __________ COUNTY STATE OF GEORGIA A.B., ) Plaintiff ) ) v. ) Civil action ) File no. __________ C.D., ) (Clerk will insert Defendant ) number.) COMPLAINT The defendant herein named is a resident of ______________ (street), __________ (city), __________ County, Georgia, and is subject to the jurisdiction of this court. 1. On the __________ day of __________, ________, defendant C.D. executed to plaintiff a warranty deed to a certain tract of land (here describe the land), for the sum of $__________, paid by plaintiff to defendant C.D. 2. Plaintiff has been evicted from said lot of land and defendant refuses to indemnify plaintiff from his damages in that behalf. 3. Because of said eviction, plaintiff has suffered damages in the amount of $__________, for which defendant is indebted to plaintiff. Wherefore, plaintiff demands judgment against defendant (here list the relief prayed for). __________________________ Attorney for plaintiff __________________________ Address
